pageContext.geocode_address: 844 S 200 E, Salt Lake City, UT 84111, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: The Force is strong in this advanced engineering course for young Jedi! Use the force to raise your X-Wing from the Dagobah swamp, challenge the AT-AT walkers on Hoth, and fly the Millennium Falcon through the Kessel Run. Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture while you explore a galaxy, far, far away.
pageContext.course_type_name: Jedi Master Engineering with LEGO® Materials
pageContext.room: Dan Rose’s room on the bottom floor.
pageContext.action_url_comment: This class is for students of Salt Lake Arts Academy. Registration is through the SLArts after-school program - www.slarts.org.
